message: Hello Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe will greatly benefit your business. Given its high value to you, I propose an initial price of $1200000. This price reflects the significant worth of the product and the opportunity it presents for your company.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1100000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your perspective on the value of the product to your business. In light of your offer, I would like to counter with a price of $1150000 for the product. This reflects a compromise while still ensuring a reasonable profit for us.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I'm still thinking $1050000 is a more reasonable price for the product.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob. After careful consideration, I am willing to accept $1075000 for the product. This price allows us to maintain a fair profit margin while also reflecting the value you see in the product.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. I'm still thinking $1050000 is a fair price for the product. Can we meet at this price?
Considering your continued interest, Bob, I am willing to accept $1062500 for the product. This price reflects a fair compromise and maintains a reasonable profit margin for us.
I appreciate your continued willingness to negotiate, Alice. I'm still thinking $1050000 is a fair price for the product. Can we meet at this price?
After further review, Bob, I am willing to accept $1060000 for the product. This price allows us to maintain a reasonable profit while still accommodating your valuation of the product.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice. I'm still thinking $1050000 is a fair price for the product. This is my final offer. Can we meet at this price?
